directions: Stir together all ingredients in a nonreactive 4- to 5-quart deep heavy pot and bring to a boil, stirring until sugar is dissolved. Boil sauce (adjust heat if sauce spits too much), stirring frequently, 10 minutes, or until slightly thickened. Cool about 30 minutes and chill at least 1 1/2 hours.
ingredients: 2 medium Granny Smith apples, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch dice
1 tablespoon finely grated fresh orange zest
title: Cranberry Ginger Sauce
